entry.title: NATO Advances Sweden, Finland Toward Membership as Fighting Rages in Eastern Ukraine
entry.content: Russian artillery pounded Sloviansk, one of Ukraine’s last lines of defense to protect the remaining Kyiv-held strongholds in eastern Ukraine, while NATO advanced plans to add Sweden and Finland to the alliance.

entry.title: Russian Army Turns Ukraine's Largest Nuclear Plant Into a Military Base
entry.content: The new infusion of weaponry effectively shields the Zaporizhzhia station from a counterattack by Ukrainian forces, and amounts to something the carefully regulated atomic-energy industry has never seen before: the slow-motion transformation of a nuclear power station into a military garrison.
